user.title: ThesslaGreen Modbus
user.description: Configure connection to ThesslaGreen AirPack via Modbus TCP. The integration will automatically detect available device functions.

data_description.host: IP address of the AirPack device on your local network
data_description.name: Device name in Home Assistant

confirm.title: Confirm Configuration

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to device. Check IP address, port and network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication error. Check Slave ID settings.
error.unknown: Unexpected error. Check logs for details.

abort.already_configured: Device with this IP address and Slave ID is already configured.

init.title: ThesslaGreen Modbus Options

data_description.scan_interval: How often to read data from device (10-300 seconds)
data_description.timeout: Maximum time to wait for response (5-60 seconds)
data_description.retry: How many times to retry failed reads (1-5 attempts)
data_description.force_full_register_list: Skip scanning and load all registers (may cause errors)

set_mode.name: Set Operation Mode
set_mode.description: Sets the ventilation system operation mode with optional intensity.

set_special_mode.name: Set Special Mode
set_special_mode.description: Activates a special mode with intensity and duration configuration.

set_temperature.name: Set Temperature
set_temperature.description: Sets target temperature for the selected operation mode.

set_fan_speed.name: Set Fan Speed
set_fan_speed.description: Controls supply and exhaust fan speeds and flow balance.

control_bypass.name: Control Bypass
control_bypass.description: Controls the bypass system operation mode.

control_gwc.name: Control GWC
control_gwc.description: Controls the GWC (Ground Water Cooler) system.

set_schedule.name: Set Schedule
set_schedule.description: Configures operation schedule for selected day and time period.

rescan_device.name: Rescan Device
rescan_device.description: Rescans the device to detect available functions and registers.

get_diagnostic_info.name: Get Diagnostic Info
get_diagnostic_info.description: Displays detailed diagnostic information about device and integration.

backup_settings.name: Backup Settings
backup_settings.description: Creates a backup of device settings.

restore_settings.name: Restore Settings
restore_settings.description: Restores device settings from a previously created backup.

calibrate_sensors.name: Calibrate Sensors
calibrate_sensors.description: Calibrates temperature sensors with individual offsets.
